description: Contains information about the decision tree node from which the order originated.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DT_NODE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the decision tree node that caused the creation of this order.

columns.name: DT_NODE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The Contact Serial Number (CSN) of the decision tree node that caused the creation of this order.
